name: Tree.Bonsai
description: An artistic bonsai tree simulation game that follows the life cycle of a plum tree. You can cut branches, add nutrients, and graft while the seasons pass and your tree grows. You can finally fulfill your dreams of a digital bonsai.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP/7/8/10 处理器: 2,2 GHz 存储空间: 需要 100 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7/10 处理器: 2,2 GHz 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
